20110103070626.000|20110103070628.000|CC1|THE SANTA CLARITA VALLEY.

20110103070632.000|20110103070635.000|CC1|SNOW ANGELS AND PLAYING IN THE

20110103070640.000|20110103070644.000|CC1|>> Reporter: JOHN, THE SNOW     
20110103070644.000|20110103070645.000|CC1|STOPPED FALLING BUT MOTHER      
20110103070645.000|20110103070649.000|CC1|NATURE PUT THE FINISHING TOUCH

20110103070746.000|20110103070747.000|CC1|LONG TIME.

20110103070801.000|20110103070802.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SNOWBALLS WERE     
20110103070802.000|20110103070803.000|CC1|FLYING AND KIDS ENJOYED THE

20110103070909.000|20110103070912.000|CC1|CHAINS ON OR STAY THE NIGHT

20110103070914.000|20110103070914.000|CC1|TOMORROW?                       
20110103070914.000|20110103070916.000|CC1|>> FIRST DAY BACK AFTER THE NEW 
20110103070916.000|20110103070917.000|CC1|YEAR.                           
20110103070917.000|20110103070918.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE ANTELOPE VALLEY
20110103070918.000|20110103070919.000|CC1|IS EXPECTED TO GET BETWEEN FLEE
